name: antWARS
description:
antWARS was meant to be a simple RTS where you controlled ants to gather sugar.
Drag the letters 'A' and 'B' in the safe zone (green area) to spawn Ants.

The prototype was developed for Mini Jam 8 - Fantasy.
Sadly the scope was too big for my time frame and current knowledge
This was developed in an afternoon time.

"Set your creation (or abomination) free"
